1. Page Title: The Hat Dilemma

2. Panels:

   - Panel 1 — Setup: Young man in tattered clothes, distressed.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Young Man: "Hey there, German hatter!" 
       • Young Man: "What a ridiculous hat!" 

   
   - Panel 2 — Setup: Close-up of the worn-out hat, anxious expression.
     Dialogue/Thoughts:
       • Young Man: "This hat could ruin everything!" 
       • Young Man: "I must blend in, not stand out!" 

3. Layout: staggered

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The young man is consumed by anxiety over his conspicuous hat, fearing it could jeopardize his carefully planned actions.
